description: Explore the transformation of software licensing through decentralized management using blockchain technology. Learn about the benefits such as enhanced security, transparency, and cost savings, as well as the challenges and future trends in the industry.
keywords: software licensing, decentralized management, blockchain technology, security, transparency, smart contracts, decentralized identity, scalability, compliance, Microsoft, Guardtime
title: Revolutionizing Software Licensing: The Shift to Decentralized Management
